arts.ttl: What Abdukodir Khusanov did after debut errors shows he can be a success at Man City
arts.sum: Manchester City took on Chelsea in the Premier League as new signings Omar Marmoush and Abdukodir Khusanov made their full debuts.

arts.ttl: Sunday briefing: Salah nets landmark Liverpool goal and Man City bounce back
arts.sum: The Reds continue to set the pace, but Arsenal are not giving up the chase, while Manchester United will return to domestic action on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola praises ‘amazing’ City reaction to going behind in Chelsea win
arts.sum: Josko Gvardiol, Erling Haaland and Phil Foden secured victory for the hosts.

arts.ttl: Why Pep Guardiola didn't speak to Man City signing Abdukodir Khusanov after debut
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola offered his full support to Manchester City debutant Abdukodir Khusanov after his errors on debut, even if he hasn't spoken to the defender himself.

arts.ttl: Sky Sports make an awkward apology to Man City live on air after Tim Sherwood's contentious comment before Chelsea clash
arts.sum: Sky Sports issued an awkward apology to Man City on Gillette Soccer Saturday after Tim Sherwood made some controversial comments regarding their transfer business.

arts.ttl: Haaland praises new Man City signing after Chelsea win as Pep’s Khusanov MISTAKE criticised
arts.sum: Haaland praises new Man City signing after Chelsea win as Pep blamed for Khusanov error It’s nice to get to know new people and to play with good players.

arts.ttl: Man City's next six fixtures compared to Liverpool and Arsenal after Premier League top four twist
arts.sum: Manchester City came from behind to beat Chelsea 3-1 in the Premier League on Saturday night

arts.ttl: Erling Haaland and Phil Foden help Manchester City to comeback win over Chelsea
arts.sum: Abdukodir Khusanov had gifted Chelsea the lead as he endured a difficult debut.

arts.ttl: What Man City players and fans did after Abdukodir Khusanov error vs Chelsea
arts.sum: Manchester City players rallied round their new signing after he suffered a difficult opening few minutes on his debut in the Premier League against Chelsea

arts.ttl: Man City v Chelsea team news: Khusanov + Marmoush debuts
